short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add items to your giftdibs.com wish lists from any site!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The all-new GiftDibs button will let Chrome users instantly add gifts to their GiftDibs.com wishlists. Easily add gifts from any site as you're shopping on the web.
